mixed-citation.article-title: Atlas of European millipedes 3: Order Chordeumatida (Class Diplopoda)

tp:treatment-sec.p: A mountain species preferring litter of coniferous and deciduous trees, sometimes mixed with gravel.

Ceuca (1985) gave the type locality as “la forêt de Slătioara, située au nord de notre pays”. There are several places of that name in northern Romania , but the type locality is tentatively interpreted as the village Slătioara in Strâmtura Commune, Maramures County .
